mapper.select: SELECT kcm.KIT_COMPANY_ID AS kitCompanyId, kc.NAME AS kitCompanyName, kc.ADDRESS FROM KIT_COMPANY_MEMBER kcm JOIN USER u ON kcm.USER_PK = u.USER_PK JOIN KIT_COMPANY kc ON kcm.KIT_COMPANY_ID = kc.KIT_COMPANY_ID WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId};

SELECT ko.KIT_ORDER_ID as kitOrderId, ko.KIT_COMPANY_ID as kitCompanyId, kc.NAME AS kitCompanyName, kc.ADDRESS, m.NAME AS mealkitName, ko.QUANTITY, ko.PRICE, (ko.QUANTITY * ko.PRICE) AS total, ko.PRODUCT_ORDER_DATE as orderDate, s.STATUS_ID as statusId, s.STATUS FROM KIT_ORDER ko JOIN KIT_COMPANY kc ON ko.KIT_COMPANY_ID = kc.KIT_COMPANY_ID JOIN MEALKIT m ON ko.MEALKIT_ID = m.MEALKIT_ID JOIN STATUS s ON ko.STATUS_ID = s.STATUS_ID WHERE ko.KIT_COMPANY_ID = #{kitCompanyId} order by orderDate DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KIT_ORDER (KIT_ORDER_ID, KIT_COMPANY_ID, MEALKIT_ID, PRICE, QUANTITY, PRODUCT_ORDER_DATE, STATUS_ID) VALUES (#{kitOrderId}, #{kitCompanyId}, #{mealkitId}, #{price}, #{quantity}, now(), 1);
mapper.select: SELECT m.NAME AS mealkitName, ks.QUANTITY as quantity FROM KIT_COMPANY kc JOIN KIT_STORAGE ks ON kc.KIT_COMPANY_ID = ks.KIT_COMPANY_ID JOIN MEALKIT m ON ks.MEALKIT_ID = m.MEALKIT_ID WHERE kc.KIT_COMPANY_ID = #{kitCompanyId};

WITH months AS ( SELECT 1 AS month UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9 UNION ALL SELECT 10 UNION ALL SELECT 11 UNION ALL SELECT 12 ), company_sales AS ( SELECT kc.KIT_COMPANY_ID AS companyId, kc.NAME AS companyName, MONTH(kol.PRODUCT_ORDER_DATE) AS orderMonth, SUM(mk.PRICE * ko.QUANTITY) AS monthlySales FROM KIT_ORDER_LOG kol JOIN KIT_ORDER ko ON kol.KIT_ORDER_ID = ko.KIT_ORDER_ID JOIN KIT_COMPANY kc ON ko.KIT_COMPANY_ID = kc.KIT_COMPANY_ID JOIN MEALKIT mk ON ko.MEALKIT_ID = mk.MEALKIT_ID WHERE kol.STATUS_ID = 3 GROUP BY kc.KIT_COMPANY_ID, kc.NAME, MONTH(kol.PRODUCT_ORDER_DATE) ) SELECT IFNULL(cs.monthlySales, 0) AS totalSales FROM (SELECT DISTINCT KIT_COMPANY_ID, NAME AS companyName FROM KIT_COMPANY) c CROSS JOIN months m LEFT JOIN company_sales cs ON c.KIT_COMPANY_ID = cs.companyId AND m.month = cs.orderMonth WHERE c.KIT_COMPANY_ID = #{kitCompanyId} ORDER BY m.month;
